36  node_.param<double>("param_matchingFeatureDistance", param_matchingFeatureDistance_, 30.0);

38  for(int i=0; i<numCameras; i++)
39  {
40  cv::Mat descriptorsPrev = getDescriptorsFromFeatures(featuresPrev[i]);

42 
43  cv::BFMatcher matcher(cv::NORM_HAMMING, true);
44  std::vector<cv::DMatch> dmatches;
45  matcher.match(descriptorsPrev, descriptorsCurr, dmatches);
46 
47  // discard poor descriptor matches
48  std::vector<cv::DMatch> goodDMatches;
49  for(int i=0; i<dmatches.size(); i++)
50  {
51  if(dmatches[i].distance < param_matchingDescriptorDistance_)
52  {
53  goodDMatches.push_back(dmatches[i]);
54  }
55  }
56

58 
59  for(int j=0; j<ms.size(); j++)
60  {
61  int camFirst = ms[j].getFirstFeature().getCamNumber();
62  int camSecond = ms[j].getSecondFeature().getCamNumber();
63 
64  if(camFirst == camSecond)
65  {
66  matches[3*camFirst].push_back(ms[j]);
67  }
68  else
69  {
70  int camLeft, camRight;
71  getLeftRightCameras(camFirst, camLeft, camRight);
72 
73  if(camSecond == camRight)
74  {
75  matches[3*camFirst+1].push_back(ms[j]);
76  }
77  else if(camSecond == camLeft)
78  {
79  matches[3*camFirst+2].push_back(ms[j]);
80  }
81  }
82  }
83  }

124 cv::Mat FeatureMatcher::getDescriptorsFromFeatures(std::vector<Feature> features)
125 {
126  cv::Mat descriptors = features[0].getDescriptor();
127 
128  for(int i=1; i<features.size(); i++)
129  {
130  descriptors.push_back(features[i].getDescriptor());
131  }
132 
133  return descriptors;
134 }

137 std::vector<Match> FeatureMatcher::DMatches2Matches(std::vector<Feature> features_1, std::vector<Feature> features_2, std::vector<cv::DMatch> dMatches)
138 {
139  std::vector<Match> matches;
140 
141  for(int i=0; i<dMatches.size(); i++)
142  {
143  Match m;
144  m.setFirstFeature(features_1[dMatches[i].queryIdx]);
145  m.setSecondFeature(features_2[dMatches[i].trainIdx]);
146  m.setDistance(dMatches[i].distance);
147  matches.push_back(m);
148  }
149  return matches;
150 }

153 cv::Mat FeatureMatcher::highlightOpticalFlow(cv::Mat image, std::vector<Match> matches)
154 {
155  cv::Mat imageOptFlow;
156  cv::cvtColor(image, imageOptFlow, CV_GRAY2BGR);
157 
158  for(int i=0; i<matches.size(); i++)
159  {
160  cv::Point2f pt_1 = matches[i].getFirstFeature().getKeypoint().pt;
161  cv::Point2f pt_2 = matches[i].getSecondFeature().getKeypoint().pt;
162 
163  cv::line(imageOptFlow, pt_1, pt_2, cv::Scalar(0, 255, 0));
164  }
165 
166  return imageOptFlow;
167 }

169 void FeatureMatcher::trackIntraCamera(cv::Mat imagePrev, cv::Mat imageCurr, std::vector<Feature> featuresPrev, std::vector<Feature> &featuresCurr, std::vector<Feature> &featuresLeft, std::vector<Feature> &featuresRight)
170 {
171  node_.param<int>("param_trackingWindowSize", param_trackingWindowSize_, 21);
172  node_.param<int>("param_trackingMaxLevel", param_trackingMaxLevel_, 0);
173  node_.param<double>("param_trackingMinEigThreshold", param_trackingMinEigThreshold_, 0.001);
174  node_.param<int>("param_trackingTermcritCount", param_trackingTermcritCount_, 20);
175  node_.param<double>("param_trackingTermcritEPS", param_trackingTermcritEPS_, 0.03);
176  node_.param<double>("param_borderPercentage", param_borderPercentage_, 0.25);
177 
178  std::vector<cv::Point2f> pointsPrev = features2Points(featuresPrev);
179  std::vector<cv::Point2f> pointsCurr = features2Points(featuresCurr);
180 
181  std::vector<uchar> status;
182  std::vector<float> error;
183  cv::TermCriteria termcrit(cv::TermCriteria::COUNT | cv::TermCriteria::EPS, param_trackingTermcritCount_, param_trackingTermcritEPS_);
184  cv::Size windowSize(param_trackingWindowSize_, param_trackingWindowSize_);
185 
186  cv::calcOpticalFlowPyrLK(imagePrev, imageCurr, pointsPrev, pointsCurr, status, error, windowSize, param_trackingMaxLevel_, termcrit, 0, param_trackingMaxLevel_);
187 
188  for(int i=0; i<featuresPrev.size(); i++)
189  {
190  if(status[i] == (int)0)
191  {
192  // is near left border -> put it in left cam vector
193  if(featuresPrev[i].getKeypoint().pt.x < param_borderPercentage_ * imagePrev.cols)
194  {
195  featuresLeft.push_back(featuresPrev[i]);
196  }
197  // is near right border -> put it in right cam vector
198  else if(featuresPrev[i].getKeypoint().pt.x > (1 - param_borderPercentage_) * imagePrev.cols)
199  {
200  featuresRight.push_back(featuresPrev[i]);
201  }
202  // is near no border -> discard
203  else
204  {
205 
206  }
207  }
208  }
209 }
210 
211 std::vector<cv::Point2f> FeatureMatcher::features2Points(std::vector<Feature> features)
212 {
213  std::vector<cv::Point2f> points;
214 
215  for(int i=0; i<features.size(); i++)
216  {
217  cv::Point2f p = features[i].getKeypoint().pt;
218  points.push_back(p);
219  }
220  return points;
221 }
